title: 06/25/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 06/25/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Doug Gottlieb filling in for Colin explains that Chris Paul doesn’t make the Suns worse, but he sure did last night. Aaron Rodgers may just opt out of the 2021 season but it could cause for more problems than solutions. Plus, Rayford Young: Trae Young’s Father and Dwane Casey: Pistons Head Coach joined Doug on The Herd!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
